name: Important On Progress
query:
SELECT
    sg.goal_title AS "Goal Title:Data:200",
    sg.priority AS "Priority:Select:100",
    sg.status AS "Status:Select:100",
    sg.business_unit AS "Business Unit:Data:150",
    sg.category AS "Category:Data:120",
    sg.goal_owner AS "Goal Owner:Link/User:150",
    sg.owner_name AS "Goal Owner Name:Data:200",
    sg.start_date AS "Start Date:Date:150",
    sg.end_date AS "End Date:150:150"
FROM
    `tabStrategic Goal` AS sg
WHERE
    sg.priority = 'Important'
    AND sg.status = 'On Progress'
ORDER BY
    sg.goal_title ASC
